experience.title: Student Coordinator
experience.description: Was a member of the core committee of Women Development Cell consisting of 4 teachers coordinators and 4 student coordinators. Focused on the themes of Gender Equality and doing away with the prevailing distortion of Feminism by holding activities and discussions involving students; spread awareness about women helpline authorities and organised seminars with eminent personalities as guests.

Secretary
experience.description: As the Secretary, I helped with the smooth running of the club of 200+ members . Maintained club records, correspondence and acted as the communication channel between the core team and club members. Drafted agendas and minutes are for both Club and Board meetings and above all, took up unprecedented and change-driving projects and events.
